meta.title: Interface PlayerInput.IUIActions | Harvest Grove code documentation

meta.name: title
meta.content: Interface PlayerInput.IUIActions | Harvest Grove code documentation

div.p: Interface to implement callback methods for all input action callbacks associated with input actions defined by "UI" which allows adding and removing callbacks.
Method invoked when associated input action "CloseMenu" is either , or .
Method invoked when associated input action "CollectDrop" is either , or .
Method invoked when associated input action "DebugMode" is either , or .
Method invoked when associated input action "DevConsole" is either , or .
Method invoked when associated input action "DividingItems" is either , or .
Method invoked when associated input action "DropItemHotbar" is either , or .
Method invoked when associated input action "Interact" is either , or .
Method invoked when associated input action "LeftClick" is either , or .
Method invoked when associated input action "Minimap" is either , or .
Method invoked when associated input action "MousePos" is either , or .
Method invoked when associated input action "MouseWheel" is either , or .
Method invoked when associated input action "MouseWheelRectEdition" is either , or .
Method invoked when associated input action "Numpad0" is either , or .
Method invoked when associated input action "Numpad1" is either , or .
Method invoked when associated input action "Numpad2" is either , or .
Method invoked when associated input action "Numpad3" is either , or .
Method invoked when associated input action "Numpad4" is either , or .
Method invoked when associated input action "Numpad5" is either , or .
Method invoked when associated input action "Numpad6" is either , or .
Method invoked when associated input action "Numpad7" is either , or .
Method invoked when associated input action "Numpad8" is either , or .
Method invoked when associated input action "Numpad9" is either , or .
Method invoked when associated input action "OpenBackpack" is either , or .
Method invoked when associated input action "Pause" is either , or .
Method invoked when associated input action "RightClick" is either , or .
Method invoked when associated input action "Rotate" is either , or .
Method invoked when associated input action "Screenshot" is either , or .
Method invoked when associated input action "ToggleQuests" is either , or .
